attributes.action: ban the feeding of gray squirrels so that our dwindling number of native red squirrels have a better chance of survival.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gray squirrels are a pest and have had a disastrous impact upon several native species, mainly our own beautiful red squirrels which are now only found in a few places such as Formby and Ainsdale where I used to live. 

I now live in Leamington Spa and am always angry when I see people feeding gray squirrels as I don't think they (like people who feed pigeons) realise just how much damage they are doing. To me, it is like feeding rats as gray squirrels are vermin. 

Please act now to save red squirrels and make it illegal to feed gray squirrels so that people doing so can be fined.
